title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A legendary rangefinder camera, the Leica M3 is renowned for its precision engineering and iconic design. This classic model remains a favorite among collectors and photographers alike. A true piece of photographic history.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: This 1965 Gibson SG Standard is a rock ‘n’ roll icon, played by legends and loved for its biting tone. Its vintage charm and rich sound make it a sought-after treasure. An exceptional piece for players and collectors.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: The computer that started it all—Apple’s Macintosh 128K revolutionized personal computing. With its groundbreaking GUI and compact design, this machine is a tech relic. A must-have for vintage Apple enthusiasts.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: The Rolex Submariner 16610 is the epitome of luxury dive watches, combining timeless style with rugged functionality. A favorite among divers and collectors, this watch is built to impress. A true investment in craftsmanship.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: The Eames Lounge Chair is an icon of mid-century modern design, blending comfort and elegance seamlessly. This piece remains a symbol of style and innovation in furniture. Ideal for design enthusiasts and collectors.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: This rare first edition of *The Great Gatsby* is a literary gem, showcasing Fitzgerald's masterpiece in its original 1925 form. Highly sought after by collectors and literary lovers alike. A tangible piece of American literary history.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: An original screen print by Banksy, known for his provocative and politically charged street art. This piece captures his signature style and subversive edge. A rare find for serious contemporary art collectors.
